title: Getting Started with Next.js
content: Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes building web applications a breeze. In this post, I'll walk you through the basics of getting started with Next.js and why it's become one of the most popular choices for React developers.
author: Admin
excerpt: Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes building web applications a breeze.
